titleStmt.title: JRC-ACQUIS 32004R0735 English

Commission Regulation (EC) No 735/2004 of 20 April 2004 amending Regulation (EC) No 1972/2003 on transitional measures to be adopted in respect of trade in agricultural products on account of the accession of the Czech Republic, Estonia, Cyprus, Latvia, Lithuania, Hungary, Malta, Poland, Slovenia and Slovakia

notesStmt.note: Only European Community legislation printed in the paper edition of the Official Journal of the European Union is deemed authentic.

body.head: Commission Regulation (EC) No 735/2004 of 20 April 2004 amending Regulation (EC) No 1972/2003 on transitional measures to be adopted in respect of trade in agricultural products on account of the accession of the Czech Republic, Estonia, Cyprus, Latvia, Lithuania, Hungary, Malta, Poland, Slovenia and Slovakia
body.p: amending Regulation (EC) No 1972/2003 on transitional measures to be adopted in respect of trade in agricultural products on account of the accession of the Czech Republic, Estonia, Cyprus, Latvia, Lithuania, Hungary, Malta, Poland, Slovenia and Slovakia
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,

Having regard to Regulation (EC) No 1972/2003 of 10 November 2003 on transitional measures to be adopted in respect of trade in agricultural products on account of the accession of the Czech Republic, Estonia, Cyprus, Latvia, Lithuania, Hungary, Malta, Poland, Slovenia and Slovakia(1), and in particular Article 4(6) thereof,

(1) In the context of the on-going examination of the risks associated with the products on the list, set out in Article 4(5) of Regulation (EC) No 1972/2003, some amendments to that list are necessary.
(2) Regulation (EC) No 1972/2003 should therefore be amended accordingly,
Article 4(5) of Regulation (EC) No 1972/2003 is amended as follows:
1. the first indent, relating to Cyprus, is amended as follows:
2. the second indent, relating to the Czech Republic, is amended as follows:
3. the third indent, relating to Estonia, is amended as follows:
4. the fourth indent, relating to Hungary, is amended as follows:
5. the fifth indent, relating to Latvia, is amended as follows:
6. the sixth indent, relating to Lithuania, is amended as follows:
7. the seventh indent, relating to Malta, is amended as follows:
8. the eighth indent, relating to Poland, is amended as follows:
9. the ninth indent, relating to Slovakia, is amended as follows:
10. the tenth indent, relating to Slovenia, is amended as follows:

This Regulation shall enter into force subject to and on the date of the entry into force of the Treaty of Accession of the Czech Republic, Estonia, Cyprus, Latvia, Lithuania, Hungary, Malta, Poland, Slovenia and Slovakia to the European Union.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
(1) OJ L 293, 10.11.2003, p. 3. Regulation as amended by Regulation (EC) No 230/2004 (OJ L 39, 11.2.2004, p. 13).
